snippet: The Russian president said Sergei M. Guriev left the country to visit his wife and exaggerated while describing his dealings with investigators.
abstract: Pres Vladimir V Putin makes first comments about economist Sergei M Guriev's flight from Russia, saying Guriev exaggerated pressure put on him by investigators and that he actually left for family reasons; Guriev, vocal critic of Kremlin policies, says he left Russia because he feared prosecution and detention in case with political overtones.
lead_paragraph: The Russian president said Sergei M. Guriev left the country to visit his wife and exaggerated while describing his dealings with investigators.

headline.seo: Putin Discusses Economist Sergei M. Guriev’s Flight From Russia
headline.main: Putin Discusses Economist’s Flight From Russia
headline.print_headline:
Russia: Putin Says Economist Who Fled
Is Free to Return Anytime He Wants
